entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Flurries beginning early this evening then changing to 40 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023
